CustomField.formula: (2000* Number_of_Products__c )- (if (text(Number_of_Births__c) = "Single", CASE (Number_of_Products__c, 1,0, 2, 300, 3, 1000, 0), if (text(Number_of_Births__c) = "Twins", CASE (Number_of_Products__c, 2,0, 3, 300, 4, 600, 5, 1300, 6, 2000, 0), if (text(Number_of_Births__c) = "Triplets", CASE (Number_of_Products__c, 3,0, 6, 900, 9, 3000, 0), 0))))
CustomField.label: 20YPP Old
